sentences.sentence: It is later that female writers begin to feel routinely, sometimes suicidally, trapped by their womanhood.
sentences.translation: 而后来的女作家开始经常因为自身的女性身份受困，有时甚至无法挣脱。

sentences.sentence: Suicidally focused on supplying 40 percent of France's uranium needs, Niger may be the world's second-largest uranium producer, but it is also today one of the poorest countries on the planet.
sentences.translation: 毁灭性地集中于供应法国铀需求量的40%，尼日尔可能是世界上第二大铀生产国，但它今天也是全球最贫穷的国家之一。
